amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $30 million for the rail line improvement program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funds for carrying out the Rail Line Relocation Projects as authorized by section 9002 of SAFETEA-LU.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 216 (Roll no. 274).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Lipinski.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
